***history***
Monica: (neutral) Hey, Joey, could you pass the cheese?
Joey: (neutral) Listen uh, Id prefer it if you didnt call me Joey.
Joey: (neutral) Since I dont know anyone here, I thought itd be cool to try out a cool work nickname.
Based on the conversation ***history*** above, as A Waiter, please choose the most appropriate emotion among {surprise,anger,neutral,joy,sadness,fear,disgust} to respond to the Joey
SourceData: Hey, dragon! Heres your tips from Monday and Tuesday.
Coct: I see, well, I'm happy to accommodate your request, sir. What would you like to be called then?
FSM: Can I get you guys something to drink?
